channel.title: [PI] How to make items donator only?
channel.description:
How to I make some specific items donator only? And if a non-donator got the item it would say "you may not weild this item" and same for shops, how do I make shops donator only accessable?
Thanks. :D

item.title: [PI] How to make items donator only?
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

ItemAssistant - for items.
ShopAssistant - for shops.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How to make items donator only?
